laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay. (Reference Range-Negative).

Evidence of left lower lobe atelectasis and a left pleural effusion which is layering on the current film. Cardiovascular contours unchanged, bilateral lungs unchanged in appearance. No pulmonary vascular congestion and no pneumothorax.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Interval placement of a right-sided PICC line and interval removal of NG tube noted.
